name: FPSoccer V1.01
description:
FPSoccer Is a first person Football game  developed by (only me) and published by no one :)

In This game you can play football with a First-Person View. So it feels kinda Realistic.
THIS IS NOT YET A FULL GAME. I WOULD LIKE TO HAVE FEEDBACK FROM THE USERS WHICH I'LL USE TO MAKE THE GAME BETTER.

CONTROLS :

 WASD -Move
Mouse - Look and Aim for shot
X - Power Shot
Z - Curved Shot

 
There is an old version of FPSoccer not available on Itch.io

Changes in V1.01 :

Added Post Proccessing Effects
Added Dribbling Sound
Increased Player height(Previously the player had the size of a pigeon XD)
The Ball now Realstically Bounces off of the player
Added A Score System
ADDED A STADIUM
More Realistic Shooting Physics
Added Options Menu
Added Goal net(not so realistic)

Bug fixes

Fixed A Bug where If you stand far from a wall, the wall would be clipped(not shown)

Thanks... Have a great Time !
